subject: A Dance With Dragons
event: Yes, yes, I'm still working on A DANCE WITH DRAGONS.

comments.article: (With thanks to danielfufrj for the cartoon).
comments.subject: thanks

comments.article:
Whoo!

This day gets better and better...
Thanks

As a former tech-support monkey, I have always highly appreciated this particular 'toon. Cheers!

And happy writing!
I used this picture when I wrote about being a tech-support monkey back in '05 ;)
We don't need the book _that_ bad!
lol!

ouch.
hope it's nothing that serious.. and.. messy.. :)

comments.upictitle: mistress of the labyrinth: froda avatar
comments.article: Thanks for the update... just don't hurt yourself or anything! ;)
Oh George, I love you.

comments.upictitle: Popular series of fiction, fancy, and fact.: The classic madbard
comments.article: We know. We're hiding in the bushes outside your house, pressing our faces against the glass when your head is averted.
ahahaha!!!

There's nothing to writing. All you do is sit down at a typewriter and open a vein.

~Walter Wellesley "Red" Smith
ouch. perfect comment for this thread though.
Thank you for the update... but I know you are just doing it so that I'll have to re read ALL of the other books again.

Exactly!

And I would have, anyway.

love the cartoon!

And take your time, we'll all be there when it's ready.

(just don't kill off Tyrion, that's all I ask) :-P

Yes, please, please, please don't kill Tyrion. You and JRR Tolkien will be the only two fantasy authors EVER who don't kill off my favorite character, assuming you can keep that poor boy alive.

And take your time. Self-mutilation is never encouraged. We'll all still love you!

comments.upictitle: A boy named Finn: Pyramid Head
comments.article:
Man thats ugly George.
Real ugly.

I'm hungry though, write something about food quick....

George, please don't frustrate yourself to the point of self-maiming. That would be unfortunate for all, especially yourself.
I greatly appreciate the quality of your novels, and anxiously await ADWD. I respect you immensely for not rushing your work in order to satisfy anyone else's demands.

Thank you for what you give to us,

Ryan
comments.subject: Nooooooo!

comments.article: I second this motion!
comments.subject: Re: Nooooooo!

comments.article: I'm usually a lurker when it comes to your posts, but this one made me smile ...in a creepy kind of way. although I started writing this *before* I've seen how bloody the little cartoon ends...

heh. me too. But, I know how bloody it ends, being a professional geek.

Relax, George. The staff of 7 working for me hasn't caught up yet, since I started them all on the first book ;) You have a bit more time.

YAY!

And somehow, that toon is perfect when discussing the world of Westeros.


Gimmee!

comments.upictitle: winter is coming, so don't stab your sister: winter is coming
comments.article: LOL, isn't it just?
Looks like it's going .... smashingly!
Completely popping up out of stalkerdom, but please don't maim yourself. I want to know the ending and I'll never know it if you're dead. ;)
Seconded! :)

comments.upictitle: Xray Is As Xray Does: furries
comments.article:
*chuckle*

Can WordStar decode forehead-to-keyboard interactions?
I'm very much looking forward to it.  MOAR FROZEN ZOMBIEZ PLEEZ!
Don't forget the "Cersi reaping what she sowed, liek woah"
I knew there was a reason I got up this morning.

Mr. Martin!

Now I do admit I am anxiously waiting for your new novel, but please don't let it come to that. It's a bit disturbing....maybe your due for a break! Happy writing!!

I am not trying to be a troll here. But it seems to me that if he needs a break it is from the million other projects that seem to be in the forefront pushing Dance to the back burner. I repsect GRMM taking the time to put out quality work but lets face it it seems like everything else is getting done at the expense of Dance.
I may be mis-informed and if that is the case then I apologize but I only read the Not a blog and the news from GRRM's own site as IMO the horse's mouth is the only place to get info.
Again not tryng to troll..just venting a little frustaration
comments.subject: Due for a break

comments.upictitle: Punkiplus de los frikismos: Medicine Dorks [Scrubs]
comments.article: And we are thankful that you keep doing it : )
What icon?
Good luck! But don't kill yourself over it
